extendedIngredients.name: cream cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ cup butter or cream cheese, room temperature

extendedIngredients.name: marshmallows
extendedIngredients.originalString: 10 oz large marshmallows (or a 10.5 oz bag of mini marshmallows)

extendedIngredients.name: red velvet cake mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/3 cup dry Red Velvet Cake mix

recipes.title: Red Velvet Cake Krispie Treats

winePairing.pairingText: Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port are great choices for Treat. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. The NV Solera Cream Sherry with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Solera Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: The Solera Cream Sherry has a brilliant amber and deep copper hue. With butterscotch and pecan aromas, the sweet salted nut and brown spice aromas carry a complex caramel accent. A sweet entry leads to a rounded, lush, moderately full-bodied palate with a lengthy, flavorful finish.

recipes.instructions: Line a 10"x15" jelly roll pan with foil and grease lightly with cooking spray. Set aside.In a large saucepan melt butter over low heatAdd marshmallows and stir until melted.Remove from heat and add in dry cake mix, stirring until mixed completely with marshmallow.Stir in rice krispie cereal and coat evenly with mixture.Pour mixture into prepared pan and press evenly. Let cool.Make filling by beating butter and powdered sugar together.Cut the krispie treat sheet in half, so you have two equal portions, and spread the filling on one of the portions.Place the other half on top and cut into squares.

steps.step: Line a 10"x15" jelly roll pan with foil and grease lightly with cooking spray. Set aside.In a large saucepan melt butter over low heat
Add marshmallows and stir until melted.
Remove from heat and add in dry cake mix, stirring until mixed completely with marshmallow.Stir in rice krispie cereal and coat evenly with mixture.
Pour mixture into prepared pan and press evenly.
Let cool.Make filling by beating butter and powdered sugar together.
Cut the krispie treat sheet in half, so you have two equal portions, and spread the filling on one of the portions.
Place the other half on top and cut into squares.
